text: Giovanni Trapattoni (born 17 March 1939) is an Italian former football player. He has played for Italy national team. He is considered to be one of the most successful coaches of Italy's Seria A. ==Career== Trapattoni had a successful career as a player with A. C. Milan in the 1960s and early 1970s. Playing as a defender and defensive midfielder.
